sub_title: Leadership development | Talent Management | Learning & Development | Culture | Performance
summary:
+10 year experience aligning, engaging and developing talents, especially leaders, around the world. Responsible for L&D, culture, engagement and D&I strategies that contribute to long term and sustainable growth for tech companies and scale ups. +7 years recruiting, developing and growing global teams.

Spanish citizen with +6 years of experience in Latin America (based in Brazil) and +4 years in Europe (based in Spain and Netherlands). 

Degree in Computer Engineering and Business Management. Passionate about technology, business and people, with deep business understanding, strategic perspective and hands-on approach.
